content: **knitted top in drops belle the piece is worked in the round with rib bottom up sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-093 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl xxxl the measurements in the chart are when the piece is stretched the actual measurements are smaller due to the rib the top is elastic so work your normal size **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-250-300-300-350-350 g colour 15 jeans blue needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
